## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have run `cargo fmt` and `cargo clippy`

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

### Security

- [ ] I have reviewed my code for security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have not introduced any new unsafe code without justification
- [ ] I have not committed secrets or sensitive information
- [ ] I have updated security documentation if needed

- [ ] I have updated the README if needed
- [ ] I have updated the API documentation
- [ ] I have added/updated inline code comments
